      • getNodes

        public Pair<Node,Node> getNodes()
        returns both endpoints of the edge.

        While the order of the nodes is not specified, the order of the nodes for a given edge object will never change.

        Returns:
        A pair of nodes representing the endpoints of the edge

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Returns edge equality.

        Returns true iff o is of type edge and both connect the same two nodes.

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - object to compare equality
        Returns:
        true if edges are equal

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns a hashcode for the edge object, unique for two given nodes.

        Two edges have the same hashcode iff the both edges connect the same two nodes.

        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        hashcode

        public boolean removeFromNodes()
        removes references to an edge from nodes, does not delete the edge.
        Returns:
        true if successful
